snippet.title: Discovery Freelancer - Official v5.0 Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Immersing yourself in the longest running, spaceship MMORPG of all time!

• Download: https://discoverygc.com/forums/showthread.php?tid=126999
• Discord: https://discord.com/invite/FdSkbZ8 

Experience space exploration, immense PvE and PvP combat, multiple professions and activities, as well as a thriving player economy. The ever-expanding sandbox of Freelancer allows you to choose your own unique space adventure from countless options.

• An official 24/7 roleplay server, hosting up to 200 players.
• An expansion of the vanilla lore, 33 years on from the original campaign.
• Player owned and operated space stations.
• 100+ new ships, ranging from light fighters up to massive dreadnoughts.
• Brand new high quality sound and visual effects to add immersive weight to combat.
• Advanced experimental technologies, including cloaking devices and jump drives.
• Brand new systems and mysteries to explore, including a 5th House and perilous alien frontiers.

*Video Credits*
• https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHtFXNDA528bXmzGAAQK4lw  - Editor
• First Light by Pedro Macedo Camacho (feat. Julie Elven) - Song
• Microsoft Flight Simulator - Japan World by Finishing Move Inc - Song
